content: the bex hat is a knit-look crochet hat pattern with a beautiful texture a shaped top and just a little bit of slouch you can add a pompom if you prefer update matching scarf available here bex scarf 1 **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 2 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 3 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 4 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 5 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 6 check out my youtube channel 7 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bex-scarf# 2 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 3 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 4 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 5 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 6 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 7 https //www youtube com/c/myhobbyiscrochetblog
